thread.title: BRIEF-ISS Recommends CB&I Shareholders Vote "For" Proposed Transaction With McDermott

title: BRIEF-ISS Recommends CB&I Shareholders Vote "For" Proposed Transaction With McDermott

organizations.name: reuters) - chicago bridge & iron company nv

text:
April 18, 2018 / 1:00 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-ISS Recommends CB&I Shareholders Vote "For" Proposed Transaction With McDermott Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Chicago Bridge & Iron Company NV : 
* LEADING PROXY ADVISORY FIRM ISS RECOMMENDS CB&I SHAREHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION WITH MCDERMOTT 
* CHICAGO BRIDGE & IRON - ISS RECOMMENDED CB&I SHAREHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” TRANSACTION WITH MCDERMOTT AT SPECIAL GENERAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS ON MAY 2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
